org.springframework.faces.ui.resource
Class ResourceHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.faces.ui.resource.ResourceHelper

public class ResourceHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Helper used by Spring Faces component renderers to add links to javascript and css resources. The resource links will be rendered in the correct format for the requests to be handled by the Spring JavaScript ResourceServlet. The resource paths are cached so that a particular resource link is only rendered once per request.

Author:
Jeremy Grelle
